input.sentences: we work hard at the office .
then got right back to work .
it 's a very nice place to work .
output.sentences: He had to work hard at the office.
There was always some business meeting that was happening.
While everyone else was in the meeting one person had to stay back and watch the security cameras.
The people in the meeting enjoyed being there more then watching the security cameras.
Overall it was a nice place to work.
